name: The Ronin Finds Human Ruins
description:
A demon and her crew plunder an ancient ruin, learning more about their flooded planet than they'd hope to know.

RPG with rich story and three fights. Some survival aspects. Lots of text so make sure you talk to everyone more than once if you wanna get all of it.

If you want more content from me, support me please.

The file is named werewolf due to it's previous title, it will be fine.

Made for Apocalypse Jam 2022.

All Art and Writing done by me.

Busts by RPG Maker Irina

Music by Kratzwerk https://kratzwerk.bandcamp.com/album/--63?from=hp
